segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister looks so hopeful, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that excited over something small.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes seems oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness seeing her miss these moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing adds to the sense of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit melancholy watching this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of nostalgia and sadness, seeing the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR
